trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for each state of a down indicator in an up-down or spin box control.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.Down> class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the different state of a down indicator in an up-down or spin box control.
Gets a visual style element that represents the disabled state of the down indicator in an up-down or spin box control.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.Down.Disabled%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a down indicator of an up-down or spin box control in the disabled state.
Gets a visual style element that represents a down indicator of an up-down or spin box control in the hot state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.Down.Hot%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents the down indicator of an up-down or spin box in the hot state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the down indicator of an up-down or spin box control in the normal state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.Down.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a down indicator up an up-down or spin box control in the normal state.
Gets a visual style element that represents the down indicator of an up-down or spin box in the pressed state.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Page.Down.Pressed%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a down indicator of an up-down or spin box in the pressed state.
